code: import*as actionType from'./actionTypes';export var addToPlayList=function addToPlayList(item){return{type:actionType.ADD_TO_PLAYLIST,item:item};};export var playlistStorage=function playlistStorage(items){return{type:actionType.PLAYLIST_STORAGE,items:items};};export var removeItemFromPlayList=function removeItemFromPlayList(item){return{type:actionType.REMOVE_ITEM_FROM_PLAYLIST,item:item};};export var deleteFavFromSurabox=function deleteFavFromSurabox(item){return{type:actionType.DELETE_FAVOURITE_FROM_SURABOX,item:item};};export var emptyFavFromSurabox=function emptyFavFromSurabox(){return{type:actionType.EMPTY_FAVOURITE_FROM_SURABOX};};export var isFromFavouritePlaylist=function isFromFavouritePlaylist(bool){return{type:actionType.IS_FROM_FAVOURITE_PLAYLIST,booleanValue:bool};};export var isFavoritePage=function isFavoritePage(value){return{type:actionType.iS_FAVORITE_PAGE,value:value};};
